titleStmt.title: Uniuersis et singulis d[omi]nici gregis pastorib[us] [et] curatis
titleStmt.author: Augustinians.
Catholic Church. aut

notesStmt.note: A certificate of confession issued by the Augustinians. 1524.--STC.
Consists of one leaf, with the text (in Latin) in duplicate. Two settings on one sheet; handle of right-hand key touches inner border of one, covers inner border of other.--STC.
Identified as STC 5626 on UMI microfilm, reels 61:21 and 1268:7 (Bodleian Library copy, filmed twice).
Reproductions of the original in the Bodleian Library.
